title: Nova

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Smite a player each night, attacking them and balancing their visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Balanced players will have their role cards put into ChatGPT (or any similar AI tool) with the prompt to balance the role given. Any additional information can be put in (faction cards, other roles, etc) to support it at the host’s discretion.
- You will learn the role of anyone you balance, and who has that role.
- You cannot survive attacks by any role with “Vigilante” in the name regardless of your defense. This attribute cannot be removed or modified.
- With the Necronomicon, you are able to select half of all living players each day, rounded up. The next night, all players except you will be forced to only target these players. Additionally, once per night, you may give yourself any attribute as long as it is present on another role that exists, host permitting.
